document.full_text: racial slurs and a noose strung up outside his barracks were among the alleged harassment an african american war veteran said he was subjected to while serving in afghanistan, according to a complaint filed this week.
document.title: african american soldier says noose strung outside barracks
lines_and_colors: racial slurs and a noose strung up outside his barracks were among the alleged harassment an african american war veteran said he was subjected to while serving in afghanistan, according to a complaint filed this week.
